page.title: 07A MOFFAT FARMER'S BOY
page.content: {ROBBIE GRAHAM,OAKRIGG FARM Our farm,about a mile outside Moffat consists of 270 acres of arable and grazing land.It is a typical medium sized farm in the area.The grassland is all improved using animal manure and artificial fertiliser.We have started to grow our own crops(turnips, barley,potatoes),the barley being sold (the grain store is unfinished)this year.No silage is made but hay is.A new bailer has been purchased.Three cattle sheds(one new)and a sheep shed accommodate the stock.The stock handling area has been enlarged which makes dipping and dosing the stock much easier.The hay crop will have to be brought in quickly this year as the grass is growing quickly(lots of rain) Altogether the farm is quite prosperous and top prices have been made on heifers.I enjoy farm life.
